title: Update contact information: phone, email, and remove address

requirements.text: Update the phone number to 8133998071 in the ContactSection component

quotes: I need to update the phone number to 8133998071

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number displays as 8133998071 in the contact section
Phone link uses tel:8133998071 for clickable functionality

requirements.text: Update the email address to camillia@myptcs.com in the ContactSection component
acceptanceCriteria: Email displays as camillia@myptcs.com in the contact section
Email link uses mailto:camillia@myptcs.com for clickable functionality

requirements.text: Remove the address contact card from the ContactSection component

quotes: to take off the address for now

acceptanceCriteria: Address contact card is no longer displayed in the contact section
Remaining contact cards (phone and email) are properly spaced and styled

requirements.text: Update the phone number to 8133998071 in the Footer component

quotes: I need to update the phone number to 8133998071

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number in footer displays as 8133998071
Phone link in footer uses tel:8133998071

requirements.text: Update the email address to camillia@myptcs.com in the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: Email in footer displays as camillia@myptcs.com

requirements.text: Remove the address from the Footer component

quotes: to take off the address for now

acceptanceCriteria: Address is no longer displayed in the footer

constraints: Do not modify the backend files

Preserve all other contact section and footer functionality
nonGoals: Changing the layout or design of contact components beyond removing the address
